message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe is worth more than its actual cost. For this exceptional item, I am proposing an offer of $200. Please let me know if this aligns with your expectations or if you would like to make a counteroffer.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the quality of the product, $200 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $150 for it.  Let me know if that works for you.
